text: Consider the depth-first-search of an undirected graph with 3 vertices P, @, and R. Let discovery time d(u) represent the time instant when the vertex w is first visited, and finish time f(w) represent the time instant when the vertex u is last visited. Given that d(P) =5units | f(P) = 12 units d(Q) = 6 units | f(Q) = 10 units d(R) = 14 unit | f(R) = 18 units Which one of the following statements is TRUE about the graph? A. There is only one connected component B. There are two connected components, and P and R are connected C. There are two connected components, and @ and R are connected D. There are two connected components, and P and () are connected gateit-2006 algorithms graph-algorithms ~ normal graph-search
